doc.title: On Some Consequences of a Passage by Guy Debord
doc.plot: The passage: "...We wanted to break out of this conditioning, in search of another use of the urban landscape, in quest of new passions." The attempt: an attack on the separation between fantasy and everyday life. The result: state legal action adjourned in contemplation of dismissal. The film: a seven minute 16mm situationist-inspired consideration of the Brooklyn Bridge.
